classes.name: ColorTriplet
classes.docstring: The red, green, and blue components of a color.

methods.name: hex
methods.docstring: get the color triplet in CSS style.

methods.name: rgb
methods.docstring:
The color in RGB format.

Returns:
    str: An rgb color, e.g. ``"rgb(100,23,255)"``.

methods.name: normalized
methods.docstring:
Convert components into floats between 0 and 1.

Returns:
    Tuple[float, float, float]: A tuple of three normalized colour components.
